San Francisco | Backend Engineer (Java, MySQL, AWS) | METROMILE | Onsite

Metromile is a start-up that is disrupting the $185 Billion car insurance market by offering an entirely new model where the monthly bill is based on miles driven, paired with a smart driving app. Our product marries engineering and data science to deliver mobile technology, automotive telematics, and data-driven applications to make a car's data accessible and useful to modern drivers.

Some articles about us: http://abc7news.com/technology/bay-area-car-insurance-compan... and http://www.businessinsider.com/insurance-startups-2015-10
